actions.text: Amendment (A011) offered by Ms. Brown-Waite, Ginny.
On agreeing to the Brown-Waite, Ginny amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment expands the scope of the GAO study required under the bill to include an examination of any effects on consumer and small business credit availability and affordability.
purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 111-98 to expand the scope of the GAO study required under this act to include an examination of any effects on consumer and small business credit availability and affordability.
